trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_TODO_00<tab>Obtain flying shark livers from flying sharks.
TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the flying shark livers to Shihoji.

TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>? <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var><var 1A 01 /var>! Might you bring me three flying shark livers? You can find them on the northern tip of this island.
TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_001<tab>I would go myself, but alas, I have grown too weak in my old age to hunt anything so fierce. That said, you shall, of course, be rewarded for your help.
TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_002<tab>Please bring me the livers of three flying sharks. You should be able to find them to the north of here.
TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_011<tab>Excellent! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Now I shall finally be able to make myself some liver oil!

TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_012<tab>It will help me to keep my eyes sharp. They are my greatest asset, after all. With my hawk-like vision, I can see everything─including the sobbing faces of those spineless bakufu soldiers at the Ruby Price. Hahaha!
TEXT_STMBDZ202_02674_SHIHOJI_000_013<tab>While I can no longer fight, for the next twenty years I intend to earn my keep at the Confederacy as a lookout!
